mdRecord.dcterms:title: Glee Club
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on photo: A Glee Club concert in Cabell Hall. The Virginia men singers combine with the women in Sweet Briar College. Double chorus concerts such as this, with Sweet Briar, Randolph-Macon, Mary Washington, or other women's glee clubs of the state are frequent events during the academic year.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
